channel.title: Highscores
channel.description: How do I add Pk points to highscores? Well, I'm not needing to put that on there, my kdr. I put it in the sidebar with the other skills, but how do i add the things to it. It's on the same database but in 'ratio' not 'skills' nor 'skillsoverall'. How do I put the ratio things on the highscores?

item.title: Highscores
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

How do I add Pk points to highscores? Well, I’m not needing to put that on there, my kdr. I put it in the sidebar with the other skills, but how do i add the things to it. It’s on the same database but in ‘ratio’ not ‘skills’ nor ‘skillsoverall’. How do I put the ratio things on the highscores?

Read full topic
